aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description2: It has already been 12 years since Zoommer appeared in the digital technics market. During these years, the company successfully established itself in the retail sales field and keeps its leading position steadily. Zoommer offers its consumers products from the world brands for the best price in Georgia.
aboutUs.description3: The company has entered the digital technics market in the October of 2009 with just one shop, and today, it combines 17 branch stores and more than 200 employees throughout the country.
aboutUs.description4: Zoommer is a retail chain of smartphones, digital cameras, laptops and audio/video technics. It should be noted, that the company was founded entirely with Georgian investment. 12 years ago, Zoommer was a startup from young entrepreneurs and during the years, it grew into the large retail chain.
aboutUs.description5: It should be noted, that the company was founded entirely with Georgian investment and 12 years ago, it was a startup from young entrepreneurs, which, during the years, grew into the large retail chain).

corporateSales.title: Corporate Sales
corporateSales.description1: Zoommer's corporate clients are served by personal sales managers.
corporateSales.description2: Corporate clients have the opportunity to take advantage of flexible payment schedules and special prices.
corporateSales.description3: Same-day delivery of the order - if the customer orders before 13:00, the order will be delivered on the same day, otherwise - on the next working day;Order delivery to regions - maximum 3 working days; Delivery time depends on the region. In central cities, the order is processed in 2 working days, and in other cases - in 3 working days;Unfortunately, we cannot serve you with fast delivery to the following addresses: Lilo, Fonichala, Orkhevi, Airport, Avchala, Tsavkis, Okrokana, Tskneti
corporateSales.description5: Thank you for using our service
